name: @brainstack/plantuml-mcp
description: PlantUML Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for generating UML diagrams

scripts.build: tsc && node scripts/add-shebang.js && shx chmod +x dist/*.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run verify && npm run build
scripts.verify: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.release:patch: npm run verify && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run verify && npm version minor && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm run verify && npm version major && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.preversion: npm run verify && git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- || (echo 'Working directory not clean, please commit or stash changes first' && exit 1)

author: Martin Ouimet <mouimet@infinisoft.world>
